data.text: @wessquatch @CityNewsVAN Yes...thanks for proving my point. Our healthcare system HAS been strained for years, so this pandemic has pushed it to its breaking point. Hence the need for widespread vaccination and restriction on public gatherings to avoid huge surges of sick ppl.

@WiredWizard69 @CityNewsVAN @cmaconthehill Overall Hospitalization rates from 2015 to end of 2021 stayed almost the same . 2021 rates were even less . Click on “Files” in the link . https://t.co/bhhjPxCFe7
@CityNewsVAN this is how things work in a "plan"demic. wake up people!
@WiredWizard69 @CityNewsVAN @cmaconthehill Lets flip this argument. didn't they promise that vaccination would keep you out of the hospital. Then why are you there clogging it up.
@sarahlavin13 @wessquatch @CityNewsVAN I guess this is the same healthcare system that they laid off a bunch of employees

@CityNewsVAN @CostaLaw Just watching this individual brings us a bad case of pink eye. Does she not understand that its the "light touch" that brought us all here in the first place.Another "desk doctor".A hybrid: Half desk-Half Doctor.
@CityNewsVAN All they do is fear mongering.
